column4: Hi fellas , i got little problem with installing java / plugins and flash player for xubuntu 7.04 amd64 . I installed java6 but cant install plugins and flash player , btw im using fx64bit ... anyone can help ?
last time I check there was no flash for firefox 64
flash for firefox 64 doesnt exist. You can not get it
if you want a kick solution use getautomatix and install fireswift
